note: I'm 17yo, bilingual (portuguese & english), and I'm interested in topics such as internet culture and technology, Linux and anything OSS related, music, digital art, as well as nature, animal life, pets, etc. I mainly use this account for reading toots, and prefer not to interact publicly. Feel free to DM me if you want to, but be aware that I'm not interested in discussing sports, religion, or politics, and any attempt of a flirty or sexual interaction will result in a block.
